title: Aggregate deductible and retrospective rating documentation
dataVerified: Insured/ceding company, aggregate deductible, loss development, retrospective premium
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Calculation status (finalized). Link to insurer/reinsurer system (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies insurer/reinsurer. Prevents fraudulent aggregate calculations. Multi-million dollar premium adjustments. Large commercial risk retrospective rating. Self-insured retention verification.
